en.aboutP2: On this portfolio you will find Bash scripting helpers, Express REST API examples, minimal web starters, Python and Java learning projects, Streamlit multi-tools and more.

en.projectsIntro: This page lists my public GitHub repositories. They include command-line tools, REST APIs, web starters and language learning snippets.
en.projectsLi1: bash-tools â€“ production-ready Bash scripting helpers (logging, retries, error handling).
en.projectsLi2: public-all-in-one â€“ multi-tool Streamlit app with SteamID finder, QR generator and bulk image downloader.
en.projectsLi3: node-api â€“ Express based REST API starter with validation, security middleware and tests.
en.projectsLi4: web-starter â€“ minimal HTML/CSS/JS boilerplate for fast web experiments.
en.projectsLi5: cpp-snippets, python-demo, java-basics â€“ small learning repos for key language concepts.
